nodes.text: Port Melephos was a maritime port on Kesh's continent of Alanciar. It was located on the northeastern part of The Shank, the southern canal-littered region of Alanciar. Following the Invasion of Alanciar in 2975 BBY, the Lost Tribe of Sith's Grand Lord Varner Hilts's airship Good Omen visited the port where it was welcomed by the local population after the Alanciari Keshiri man Jogan Halder convinced the locals the Sith were not a threat.
